players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Alice was found dead last night, which is very suspicious. Charlie's silence so far worries me—everyone needs to speak up so we can figure out who the mafia is."
Diana: "I think we need to get more from Bob and Charlie. Bob, can you share any thoughts? Charlie, your silence is concerning—are you hiding something?"
Charlie: "Nothing to say, I'm just a silent type."
You: "I have information that Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now before he kills again."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
